channel.title: ethylene content on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ethylene content on funPlantGenes

item.title: AcKUP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ach02g251101.2 Gene Symbol: AcKUP2 Gene Name: K+ transporter KT/HAK/KUP 2 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-induced potassium transporter AcKUP2 gene is involved in kiwifruit postharvest ripening.

item.title: AdMsrB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc04318 Gene Symbol: AdMsrB1 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AdMsrB1 is a novel ethylene-regulated gene expressed in ripening kiwifruit.

item.title: AdNAC72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc13705 Gene Symbol: AdNAC72 Gene Name: Genome: Genome_version:Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Upregulation of AdMsrB1 in response to ethylene requires TFs AdNAC2 and AdNAC72.

item.title: BnERF2.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnERF2.4 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like (ERF2.

item.title: CiACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g037587m Gene Symbol: CiACS4 Gene Name: Citrus ACC synthase 4 Genome: citrus reference genome Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Citrus ACC synthase CiACS4 regulates plant height by inhibiting gibberellin biosynthesis.

item.title: CsERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF2 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsERF2, an ethylene response factor, plays a role in leaf variegation.

item.title: DcROS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Dca30799 Gene Symbol: DcROS1 Gene Name: REPRESSOR OF SILENCING1 Genome: carnation reference genome Species: Dianthus caryophyllus Functional Descriptions: DNA methylation in the promoter region of genes during natural and ethylene-induced flower senescence in carnation (Dianthus caryophyllus L.

item.title: FaRIPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaRIPK1 Gene Name: red-initial protein kinase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Silencing FaRIPK1 expression by VIGS affects ripening-related processes and corresponding gene expression.

item.title: GhACO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACO1 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate oxidase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhXB38D represses cotton fibre elongation through ubiquitination of ethylene biosynthesis enzymes GhACS4 and GhACO1.

item.title: GhACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACS4 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 4 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhXB38D represses cotton fibre elongation through ubiquitination of ethylene biosynthesis enzymes GhACS4 and GhACO1.

item.title: GhERF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G1817 Gene Symbol: GhERF9 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 9 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we have demonstrated that one of the ERF TFs in cotton, GhERF9, exerts a regulatory role in enhancing the expression of GhHAK5a by binding to its promoter region.

item.title: LeACS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g095080.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeACS2 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Turnover of LeACS2, a wound-inducible 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid synthase in tomato, is regulated by phosphorylation/dephosphorylation.

item.title: LeEix2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeEix2 Gene Name: receptor-like protein EIX2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Endosomal signaling of the tomato leucine-rich repeat receptor-like protein LeEix2.

item.title: MaOFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma08_t28410.1 Gene Symbol: MaOFP1 Gene Name: Genome: banana genome database (https://banana-genome.

item.title: PacCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: RbCP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RbCP1 Gene Name: cysteine protease 1 Genome: Species: Rosa burboniana Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional activation of a 37 kDa ethylene responsive cysteine protease gene, RbCP1, is associated with protein degradation during petal abscission in rose.

item.title: RhERF113
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhERF113 Gene Name: cultivar cultivar Samantha ERF113 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaa Functional Descriptions: RhERF113 Functions in Ethylene-Induced Petal Senescence by Modulating Cytokinin Content in Rose.

item.title: SlERF.H6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g120840 Gene Symbol: SlERF.H6 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlGT31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g012720 Gene Symbol: SlGT31 Gene Name: GT factor31 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Trihelix transcription factor SlGT31 regulates fruit ripening mediated by ethylene in tomato.

item.title: TaAQP8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaAQP8 Gene Name: aquaporin 8 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a Wheat Aquaporin Gene, TaAQP8, Enhances Salt Stress Tolerance in Transgenic Tobacco.
